docna.cdata!:
Rwanda - Technical Assistance Project :
            Credit 1217 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Rwanda - Technical Assistance
            Project : Credit 1217 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Technical Assistance Project
            will provide: (a) a study fund to finance prefeasibility,
            feasibility, and detailed engineering studies; (b) training
            seminars in Rwanda on project preparation and
            implementation; (c) a project economist to provide technical
            assistance in managing the study fund; (d) a financial
            analyst to strengthen the National Bureau for the Study of
            Projects; (e) building and equipping of a Documentation
            Center; (f) a documentalist to organize and start up the
            Documentation Center; and (g) vehicles.
